name: SwapFace
description: SwapFace is an AI-powered platform for seamless face swapping in photos, videos, and GIFs, offering free and premium tools for creative content creation.
longDescription: SwapFace is an all-in-one AI platform designed to provide fast, realistic, and user-friendly face-swapping tools for photos, videos, and GIFs. Leveraging advanced AI algorithms and high-performance GPUs, it enables users to effortlessly replace faces across various media types with high accuracy and natural results. The platform caters to both casual users creating fun content and professionals seeking high-quality outputs for marketing or entertainment purposes. SwapFace prioritizes user privacy by encrypting data and automatically deleting uploaded files within 24 hours. Its mission is to make face-swapping accessible, creative, and secure, eliminating the need for complex editing skills. The service also supports commercial use, provided uploaded content adheres to copyright and privacy regulations.
features: Photo Face Swap allows users to seamlessly replace faces in images with realistic results in seconds, perfect for creating memes or personalized photos.
Video Face Swap enables users to swap faces in videos with smooth, lifelike integration, supporting formats like MP4, WEBM, and AVI up to 2 minutes long.
GIF Face Swap lets users create custom GIFs by swapping faces in trending or personal animations, ideal for social media pranks.
Multiple Face Swap supports swapping multiple faces in a single photo or video, enabling group photo edits with ease.
Clothes Swap uses AI to virtually try on clothing, helping users visualize outfits for online shopping or fashion content creation.
HD Download provides high-definition outputs for free, ensuring professional-quality results for creative projects.
One-Click Processing simplifies face swapping with a single button, requiring no technical skills for instant results.
Privacy Protection ensures all uploaded files are encrypted and deleted within 24 hours, safeguarding user data.
Mobile Optimization allows seamless use on Android and iOS devices via browsers without requiring app downloads.
Gender Swap supports swapping faces across genders while maintaining consistent hairstyles and expressions for creative edits.

faqs.question: Is SwapFace free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, SwapFace offers free credits for new users to try its AI tools, with additional credits available for purchase to unlock more features.

faqs.question: What types of media does SwapFace support?
faqs.answer: SwapFace supports face swapping in photos (JPG, PNG, WEBP), videos (MP4, WEBM, AVI), and GIFs, with a maximum video size of 100MB and 2 minutes.

faqs.question: How long does it take to process a face swap?
faqs.answer: Photo face swaps take 15-20 seconds, while video face swaps are completed in about 3 minutes, offering industry-leading speed.

faqs.question: Is my data secure on SwapFace?
faqs.answer: Yes, SwapFace uses encryption for all data processing and automatically deletes uploaded files within 24 hours to ensure privacy.

faqs.question: Can I use SwapFace results for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, results can be used commercially as long as the original images or videos do not infringe on copyrights or privacy rights.

faqs.question: Does SwapFace require software installation?
faqs.answer: No, SwapFace operates entirely online through browsers, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices, including Android and iOS.

faqs.question: Can I swap multiple faces in one image or video?
faqs.answer: Yes, SwapFace’s Multiple Face Swap feature allows users to replace multiple faces in a single photo or video with ease.

faqs.question: What happens if I’m not satisfied with the face swap result?
faqs.answer: Users can preview results and try again if unsatisfied, adjusting inputs for better outcomes before downloading.
